sentences.en: A river forms the boundary between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 一条河流成了两国的分界线.

sentences.en: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.cn: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.en: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.cn: 邻国之间的边界争端

sentences.en: Boundary friction is independent of the guide material used.
sentences.cn: 边界摩擦与导纱杆材料质地无关.

sentences.en: Delineation of a boundary is limited to the visible features.
sentences.cn: 界限的轮廓是受可见要素限制的.

sentences.en: He came up to the boundary fence, and stood to regain breath.
sentences.cn: 他来到了隔篱旁, 站在那里喘着气.

sentences.en: Just before the town boundary fork left onto a minor road.
sentences.cn: 快到城镇边界时要走岔路的左边一条小路。

sentences.en: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.cn: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.en: The ball ran to the boundary.
sentences.cn: 球向边线滚去.

sentences.en: The ball was caught by a fielder standing just inside the boundary.
sentences.cn: 那个球被正站在边界内的守场员接住了.

sentences.en: the boundaries of human knowledge
sentences.cn: 人类知识的极限

sentences.en: The boundary between Shanxi and Shaanxi is the Huanghe River.
sentences.cn: 山西和陕西以黄河为界.

sentences.en: The duke perambulated the boundary of his estate.
sentences.cn: 公爵巡视他的庄园地界。

sentences.en: The lane is the boundary of our land from theirs.
sentences.cn: 那条小路就是我们这片地与他们那片地的分界线。

sentences.en: The last two integrals correspond to the natural boundary conditions.
sentences.cn: 最后两个积分对应于自然边界条件.

sentences.en: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.cn: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.en: The river is the boundary between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 这条河是两国的界河.

sentences.en: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.cn: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.en: The two properties touch ( each other ) , ie share a boundary.
sentences.cn: 这两块地产相毗邻.

sentences.en: We attach the boundary conditions to the steady - state solution U ( x ).
sentences.cn: 我们把边值条件联系到定态解U ( x ) 上.

sentences.en: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.cn: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.en: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.cn: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.en: With the retreat of this boundary the cohesive bonds gradually yield.
sentences.cn: 随着这种边界的后退,凝聚性结合逐渐屈服.

words.tran_cn: 有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的

trans.tran_en: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone
